texto: limits. At the simplest level, a plotted point that falls outside the control limits signals a possible change in the process, possibly due to some “assignable cause”. This points to the need to investigate the cause of the “out-of-control” point and make process adjustments where necessary. This helps to maintain process stability and improve processes in the long run. Any variable (measurement data) representing a characteristic of interest of a product, service or process can be plotted.
